statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyEfficiencyTracking WHERE id = 1;
SELECT device_name, energy_consumption_after FROM EnergyEfficiencyTracking WHERE upgrade_type = 'HVAC';
SELECT location, upgrade_type FROM EnergyEfficiencyTracking WHERE energy_consumption_after < 300;
SELECT * FROM EnergyEfficiencyTracking ORDER BY upgrade_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, energy_consumption_before, energy_consumption_after FROM EnergyEfficiencyTracking WHERE upgrade_type = 'Lighting' AND energy_consumption_before > 400;
SELECT * FROM EnergyEfficiencyTracking WHERE location = 'Office' ORDER BY energy_consumption_before DESC;
SELECT device_name, location, upgrade_date FROM EnergyEfficiencyTracking WHERE upgrade_type = 'LED Lighting' AND energy_consumption_after < 50;
SELECT id, device_name, upgrade_type FROM EnergyEfficiencyTracking WHERE energy_consumption_before > 100 AND energy_consumption_after < 80 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT location, device_name, upgrade_type, upgrade_date FROM EnergyEfficiencyTracking WHERE energy_consumption_before - energy_consumption_after > 20;
SELECT * FROM EnergyEfficiencyTracking WHERE location = 'Warehouse' AND upgrade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM energy_before_upgrade;
SELECT date, energy_consumption FROM energy_after_upgrade WHERE energy_consumption > 100;
SELECT energy_consumption, date FROM energy_before_upgrade ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, date, energy_consumption FROM energy_after_upgrade WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(energy_consumption) AS avg_consumption FROM energy_after_upgrade;
SELECT * FROM energy_before_upgrade ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, date, energy_consumption FROM energy_after_upgrade WHERE energy_consumption > 100 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT date, AVG(energy_consumption) AS avg_consumption FROM energy_before_upgrade GROUP BY date HAVING AVG(energy_consumption) > 50;
SELECT * FROM energy_after_upgrade WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT id, SUM(energy_consumption) AS total_consumption FROM energy_after_upgrade GROUP BY id HAVING SUM(energy_consumption) > 500;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionBeforeUpgrade
SELECT id, consumption_amount FROM EnergyConsumptionAfterUpgrade
SELECT id, timestamp FROM EnergyEfficiencyImprovements
SELECT id, improvement_percentage FROM EnergyEfficiencyImprovements
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionBeforeUpgrade ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumptionBeforeUpgrade WHERE consumption_amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, consumption_amount FROM EnergyConsumptionAfterUpgrade WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT EcBefore.id, EcBefore.timestamp, EcAfter.timestamp, EcImprovements.improvement_percentage FROM EnergyConsumptionBeforeUpgrade AS EcBefore JOIN EnergyConsumptionAfterUpgrade AS EcAfter ON EcBefore.id = EcAfter.id JOIN EnergyEfficiencyImprovements AS EcImprovements ON EcBefore.id = EcImprovements.before_upgrade_id;
SELECT SUM(consumption_amount) AS total_consumption FROM EnergyConsumptionBeforeUpgrade WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';

SELECT EcBefore.id, EcBefore.timestamp, EcAfter.timestamp, EcImprovements.improvement_percentage FROM EnergyConsumptionBeforeUpgrade AS EcBefore LEFT JOIN EnergyConsumptionAfterUpgrade AS EcAfter ON EcBefore.id = EcAfter.id LEFT JOIN EnergyEfficiencyImprovements AS EcImprovements ON EcBefore.id = EcImprovements.before_upgrade_id WHERE EcAfter.consumption_amount IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_before_upgrade
SELECT id, date, room_id, energy_consumed_before FROM energy_consumption_after_upgrade ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT energy_consumed_after, room_id FROM energy_consumption_after_upgrade WHERE energy_consumed_after > 100
SELECT upgrade_id, upgrade_date, upgrade_description, upgrade_cost FROM upgrade_details WHERE upgrade_cost < 500
SELECT room_name, room_type FROM room_details WHERE building_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY room_name
SELECT id, date, room_id, energy_consumed_before FROM energy_consumption_before_upgrade WHERE energy_consumed_before > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT upgrade_id, upgrade_date, upgrade_description FROM upgrade_details WHERE upgrade_cost < 5000 ORDER BY upgrade_date ASC
SELECT id, room_name, room_type, building_id FROM room_details WHERE room_type = 'Office' ORDER BY room_name ASC
SELECT id, date, room_id, energy_consumed_before FROM energy_consumption_before_upgrade WHERE room_id = 'ABC123' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'

SELECT ec.id, ec.date, ec.room_id, ec.energy_consumed_before, ua.energy_consumed_after, ud.upgrade_description FROM energy_consumption_before_upgrade ec JOIN energy_consumption_after_upgrade ua ON ec.id = ua.id JOIN upgrade_details ud ON ec.id = ud.upgrade_id WHERE ec.energy_consumed_before > ua.energy_consumed_after ORDER BY ec.date DESC
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, energy_consumed_before, energy_consumed_after FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed_before > 100;
SELECT energy_consumed_before, energy_consumed_after FROM energy_consumption WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT location_name, address FROM locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT upgrade_name, cost FROM upgrades WHERE cost < 5000;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed_before > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, energy_consumed_before, energy_consumed_after FROM energy_consumption WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY energy_consumed_before ASC;
SELECT u.upgrade_name, u.cost, i.improvement_percentage, i.start_date FROM upgrades u JOIN energy_improvement i ON u.id = i.upgrade_id WHERE i.end_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY i.start_date DESC;
SELECT l.location_name, l.address, e.source_name FROM locations l JOIN energy_sources e ON l.id = e.id WHERE e.source_type = 'Renewable' ORDER BY l.location_name;

SELECT ec.date, ec.energy_consumed_before, ec.energy_consumed_after, u.upgrade_name, i.improvement_percentage FROM energy_consumption ec JOIN upgrades u ON ec.id = u.id JOIN energy_improvement i ON u.id = i.upgrade_id ORDER BY ec.date DESC LIMIT 10;
